title: [Large-Scale] Science Teaching Competency Enhancement via Online Cross-Cultural Collaborative Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Basic science knowledge and experience with online learning tools
context.additional_context: A program for learners from diverse cultural backgrounds to collaboratively develop competencies in designing and implementing science lessons online

learning_goals: Learners can design collaborative problem-solving strategies in virtual environments by applying expansive learning theory.
Learners can propose culturally adapted approaches to science teaching methods through cross-cultural team-based activities.
Learners can evaluate their competency in designing and implementing effective online science lessons in resource-limited technical environments.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
